items.title: Fifty years on, the Greensboro sit-in movement stands as a...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Fifty years on, the Greensboro sit-in movement stands as a testament to the critical role of sustained mass action as a vehicle for social change.

On Feb. 1, 1960, Ezell A. Blair Jr., David Leinhail Richmond, Joseph Alfred McNeil, and Franklin Eugene McCain entered their local Woolworths store in Greensboro, N.C. The four students at North Carolina Agricultural and Mechanical University purchased some school supplies, then sat down... #racism

liberationnews.org

The Greensboro student sit-ins: A turning point for the movement

On Feb. 1, 1960, Ezell A. Blair Jr., David Leinhail Richmond, Joseph Alfred McNeil, and Franklin Eugene McCain entered their local Woolworths store in Greensboro, N.C. Trump is being rehabilitated by the Republicans, yes. But the Democrats are doing their part to help his image with the doomed-to-fail show trial of impeachment and Biden's appeals for "unity" with the Republicans.

items.title: "We are saying, no evictions, no foreclosures, cancel the...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

"We are saying, no evictions, no foreclosures, cancel the rents, cancel mortgages for homeowners and small business, small landlords," said Lillian House, organizer with PSL. "The banks can afford to suspend rent and mortgage payments, and that's what we want. Anything less we are going to see millions of people on the streets, and that is unacceptable."

Check out the Gazette's coverage of yesterday's car protest: https://gazette.com/‚Ä¶/collection_c64cdf3a-636e-11eb-9b4e-0b‚Ä¶

+7

items.title: CANCEL THE RENTS!! üì¢üì¢üì¢ Today Denver joined people in...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

CANCEL THE RENTS!! üì¢üì¢üì¢ Today Denver joined people in 30+ cities for a national day of action to #CanceltheRents. Our caravan was greeted all along the way by people coming out of their homes and stopping their cars to express their support for rent and mortgage cancellation.

Tens of millions of people in this country can't pay make their rent and mortgage payments. Months of debt is piling up, and when the eviction moratoriums expire, we are going to see a wave of evictions of historic proportions. That is, unless we FIGHT BACK and demand real relief!

+41

items.title: WATCH & SHARE - Full documentary In Defense of Justice in...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

WATCH & SHARE - Full documentary In Defense of Justice in Denver, a film about the crackdown on the leaders of the peaceful movement for #JusticeforElijahMcClain

BreakThrough News

The only people charged over the brutal police murder of Elijah McClain are community activists who organized mass peaceful demonstrations calling for justice. ...They are facing up to 48 years in prison - among the highest charges for peaceful political protest in recent history.

#JusticeForElijahMcClain #DropTheChargesCO

items.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è Evictions are gearing up again ‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è Evictions are gearing up again ‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è Governor Polis allowed the state eviction moratorium to expire on January 1, knowing that it would mean the resumption of many evictions where there are gaps in the federal moratorium.

Once the federal moratorium expires, over 15% of Coloradans may face eviction.

PSL has been going door-to-door talking to people about the dire housing crisis, and we are already coming across eviction notices.

...

If we are to prevent masses of evictions‚Äîevictions in the millions‚Äîwe need to fight to demand REAL relief policies from the government. No evictions, no foreclosures, and CANCELLATION of rent and mortgage payments.

This Saturday is a National Day of Action to #CANCELTHERENTS. Denver is joining people in cities and towns all over the country and holding a car protest beginning at 2pm at 3815 Steele St.

RSVP & invite your friends: Cancel the Rents! Denver Car Protest ‚Ä¢ National Day of Action

See More+3

items.title: ‚ÄúRight now, the Democratic Party has the power to take...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

‚ÄúRight now, the Democratic Party has the power to take decisive action that would completely marginalize the far right and deal a severe blow to Trump-ism. The Democrats could pass a sweeping set of economic reforms enacting a living wage, canceling rent for the duration of the pandemic, expanding union rights and establishing a system of universal healthcare without needing a single Republican vote in Congress. Joe Biden could cancel student loan debt through executive action. The Biden administration‚Äôs Department of Justice could immediately arrest Donald Trump, now a private citizen, for insurrection along with his high-level co-conspirators.‚Äù

The Democratic Party is squandering this historic opportunity -- not because they have to, but because they are choosing to. #AssaultontheCapitol #Capitolbuildingattack #COVID19

liberationnews.org

How the Democrats are Throwing Away A Golden Opportunity ‚Äî Again!

The Democratic Party is squandering this historic opportunity -- not because they have to, but because they are choosing to. #AssaultontheCapitol #Capitolbuildingattack #COVID19The Democratic Party is squandering this historic opportunity -- not because they have to, but because they are choosing to. #AssaultontheCapitol #Capitolbuildingattack #COVID19

items.title: The extension of the federal eviction moratorium through 3/31 is...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

The extension of the federal eviction moratorium through 3/31 is an important temporary relief measure. But what happens when it expires?

Postponing evictions is NOT ENOUGH!

Join the Jan 30 national day of action to #CanceltheRents!

...

DENVER CAR PROTEST: Saturday 1/30, 2pm, 3815 Steele St. Deck out your car!
